entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
